00016 typedef void (*FormatFunc)(cchar*, ...);
00017 
00018 /// see Log::log_header
00019 extern TC2API FormatFunc log_header(cchar*, int, uint);
00020

00022 extern TC2API FormatFunc log_fheader(cchar*, cchar*, int, uint);

00038 
00039 /// standard source file name for inclusion in log
00040 #define log_func(x) static cchar func[] = #x
00041 
00042 // always uses the variable name "sourceID" to identify the current source file
00043 
00044 /// log error record (see Log::log_header)
00045 #define log_error log_header(sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_ERROR)
00046 
00047 /// log fatal error record (see Log::log_header)
00048 #define log_fatal log_header(sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_FATAL)
00049 
00050 /// log informational record (see Log::log_header)
00051 #define log_info  log_header(sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_INFO)
00052 
00053 /// log warning record (see Log::log_header) 
00054 #define log_warn  log_header(sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_WARN)
00055 
00056 /// log debug record (see Log::log_header)
00057 #define log_debug log_header(sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG)
00058 
00059 /// log trace record (see Log::log_writeTrace)
00060 #define log_trace(msg,buf,len) log_writeTrace(sourceID, __LINE__, msg, buf, len)
00061 
00062 /// log error record with function identification (see Log::log_fheader)
00063 #define log_ferror log_fheader(func, sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_ERROR)
00064 
00065 /// log fatal error record with function identification (see Log::log_fheader)
00066 #define log_ffatal log_fheader(func, sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_FATAL)
00067 
00068 /// log informational record with function identification (see Log::log_fheader)
00069 #define log_finfo  log_fheader(func, sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_INFO)
00070 
00071 /// log warning record with function identification (see Log::log_fheader)
00072 #define log_fwarn  log_fheader(func, sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_WARN)
00073 
00074 /// log debug record with function identification (see Log::log_fheader) 
00075 #define log_fdebug log_fheader(func, sourceID, __LINE__, LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG)
00076

00079 enum LogLevel
00080 {
00081    LOG_LEVEL_FATAL = 0  ,
00082    LOG_LEVEL_ERROR = 10 ,
00083    LOG_LEVEL_WARN  = 20 ,
00084    LOG_LEVEL_INFO  = 30 ,
00085    LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG = 40 ,
00086    LOG_LEVEL_TRACE = 50
00087 };
